messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] stereotypes (Sandra)
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/20/02 10:38:36 AM, azhom@jcn.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/20/02 10:38:36 AM, azhom@... writes:

<< I've picked out Midwesterners because there are some faces and body-builds
that are SO Nebraska/Kansas/Missouri, and they wear two shirts a lot, the
guys. Flannel over something, or a patterned shirt over something.

SANDRA!!!!!!! I want to know...... have you been spying on us? I laughed
soooooo hard at this my sides still hurt! My husbands wears 2 shirts
everyday. Today it was red t-shirt with red checked flannel over it!! LOL
LOL >>

Yes, that's invariably the flight to St. Louis. <g>

Sandra

messages.subject: stereotypes (Sandra)
messages.msgSnippet: Sandra wrote, I ve picked out Midwesterners because there are some faces and body-builds that are SO Nebraska/Kansas/Missouri, and they wear two shirts a lot,

I've picked out Midwesterners because there are some faces and body-builds
that are SO Nebraska/Kansas/Missouri, and they wear two shirts a lot, the
guys. Flannel over something, or a patterned shirt over something.

SANDRA!!!!!!! I want to know...... have you been spying on us? I laughed

everyday. Today it was red t-shirt with red checked flannel over it!! LOL
LOL

KIM in MISSOURI ha ha ha ah ah ah aha h
still laughing.. you hit the nail on the head!
